DOC.brief_summary: This study will examine the performance of SeprasSpray in patients undergoing abdominal surgery (laparoscopic).
DOC.brief_title: Manageability and Safety Assessment of Sepraspray in Abdominal Surgery.
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 years old and over that require laparoscopic abdominal surgery Patients who are pregnant or have an ongoing infectious complications from a previous surgery
